Name: Nathan
description:
Nathan is a repeat client from Nyabondo. He thanks Kiva for always bailing him out on financial needs. He is a renown farmer growing bananas for sell on a large scale.

His customers are lorry drivers who sell products in several markets around the country. He has managed to corner the market due to his good quality products.

He is therefore seeking a loan to buy mulch to control soil erosion which is reduces soil quality. He hopes to continue serving his customers with the best as always. Thank you funders.
